sentences.en: a need to fly in the face of convention.
sentences.cn: 公然违反习俗的必要。

sentences.en: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.cn: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

sentences.en: Ellen flew across the room and greeted her uncle with a kiss.
sentences.cn: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.en: He prefers to fly economy class.
sentences.cn: 他宁愿乘坐经济舱。

sentences.en: He won himself two first-class tickets to fly to Dublin.
sentences.cn: 他为自己赢得了两张飞往都柏林的头等舱机票。

sentences.en: Helicopters fly in appalling weather to succour shipwrecked mariners.
sentences.cn: 直升机在恶劣的天气条件下起飞前去援救遇难的船员。

sentences.en: His inspiration to fly came even before he joined the Army.
sentences.cn: 他想开飞机的念头在参军之前就有了。

sentences.en: I knew there were no flies on her, but I wondered how she had found out.
sentences.cn: 我知道她很精明，但不明白她是如何发现的。

sentences.en: I must fly or I'll miss my plane.
sentences.cn: 我必须赶快走了否则就会误机。

sentences.en: I thought that I would &B{fly a kite for} a somewhat unfashionable theory.
sentences.cn: 我想要为有点不合潮流的理论试探一下舆论。

sentences.en: I'll fly it to London in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我明天上午会把它用航空快件寄到伦敦。

sentences.en: I'll have to fly.
sentences.cn: 我得赶紧走了。

sentences.en: In the park people were walking their dogs or flying their kites.
sentences.cn: 公园里，人们或在遛狗，或在放风筝。

sentences.en: Losing a game would cause him to fly into a rage.
sentences.cn: 输掉一场比赛会让他暴跳如雷。

sentences.en: Magda was going to fly standby.
sentences.cn: 马格达将购买起飞前的廉价剩余机票旅行。

sentences.en: Maurice is nervous about flying, so he usually travels overland.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯害怕乘坐飞机，因此他一般走陆路。

sentences.en: people in the area seemed to die like flies in the winter.
sentences.cn: 这个地区冬天大量死人。

sentences.en: Ray wouldn't hurt a fly.
sentences.cn: 雷心肠很软。

sentences.en: She’s flying back to the States tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 她明天乘飞机回美国。

sentences.en: The aircraft was a delight to fly.
sentences.cn: 驾驶这架飞机是一件乐事。

sentences.en: The mother bird will feed her chicks until they are able to fly.
sentences.cn: 母鸟将喂养小鸟直到它们会飞。

sentences.en: The plane was attacked as it flew over restricted airspace.
sentences.cn: 飞机在飞越空中禁区时遭到了攻击。

sentences.en: The trousers have a fly fastening.
sentences.cn: 这条裤子是前开口。

sentences.en: Then the woodcutter let his axe fly— Thwack! Everyone heard it.
sentences.cn: 然后那个伐木工脱手甩出了斧头。哐！每个人都听见了。

sentences.en: There were flies buzzing all around us.
sentences.cn: 苍蝇嗡嗡地在我们周围飞来飞去。

sentences.en: to fly a kite
sentences.cn: 放风筝

sentences.en: Will you take the train there or fly?
sentences.cn: 你去那里是坐火车还是坐飞机？

sentences.en: You can fly direct to Amsterdam from most British airports.
sentences.cn: 从英国的大多数机场都可以直飞阿姆斯特丹。

words.tran_cn: 轻浮的；翅状的；（衣服）不合身的；尖形的
海市蜃楼；轻浮的人；宽大不合身的衣服；新飞机
传单；飞鸟；飞行物；飞跳；孤注一掷

phrases.tran_cn: 美中不足之处；令人扫兴的小事
飞逝；（一架或几架飞机）在低空飞过指定地点，飞越；宇宙飞船飞近天体
有雄心大志；情绪高涨；野心勃勃
飞出；飞速（或突然）地跑掉
v. 冲出；突然怒骂（或动武）
(英， 粗俚)非常兴奋的，紧张忙碌的；疯狂的

trans.tran_cn: 机灵的；机警的；不会上当的,时髦迷人的；漂亮的
苍蝇，（作钓饵的）苍蝇，（裤子的）前裆开口，门帘
trans.tran_en: a small flying insect with two wings
to make a  kite  fly in the air
